title: Subway Surfers 2013
description:
Finally, this is a PC version of Subway Surfers with full mouse and keyboard support (as you can remember, there were some troubles either with mouse or with keyboard in previous versions).

Instructions For Keyboard:
**********************
1.Install Game - Subway Surfers 2013
2.Install "AutoHotkey.exe"
3.Open "Subsurf.exe" (AutoHotkey File - 'H - Icon')
4.Now Open the Game - "Subway_Surfers.exe"
Enjoy....!!

Controls:

UP ARROW - Jump
DOWN ARROW - Roll
LEFT ARROW - Dodge Left
RIGHT ARROW - Dodge Right
SPACE BAR(Double Tap) - Hower Board


Instructions For Mouse:
********************
use your mouse by clicking + scrolling your mouse.

click + scroll up = jump
click + scroll down = roll
click + scroll left = it will go to left
click + scroll right = it will go to right

Game Description:
***************
DASH as fast as you can!
DODGE the oncoming trains!

Help Jake, Tricky & Fresh escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog.

Game Features:
*************
Grind trains with your cool crew!
Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
Hoverboard Surfing!
Paint powered jetpack!
Lightning fast swipe acrobatics!
Challenge and help your friends!

Join the most daring chase!
